short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ALT+Click links for a popup preview

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of context switches and too many tabs? Get a sneak peak preview of links.  Press the ALT key when clicking a link and a preview popup will appear! don't worry about those popups, they automatically disappear when the popup loses focus.
